          <title>
            <string language="en">Synthesis of ATP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synthese von Atp</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Synthèse de triphosphate d'adénosine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Síntese do ATP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sintesi del trifosfato di adenosina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθεση του ATP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Síntesis del ATP</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the process of producing adenosine triphosphate (ATP) via an ATP synthase located in the phospholipid bilayer of the mitochondrion or chloroplast of a cell.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">adenosine triphosphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ATP synthase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chloroplasts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mitochondria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phosphate groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phospholipid bilayer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thylakoid membrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Prozeß des 
Produzierens des Adenosintriphosphats (Atp) über ein Atp synthase, 
das im Phospholipid bilayer des Mitochondrion oder des Chloroplasts 
einer Zelle gelegen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre le processus de 
produire le triphosphate d'adénosine (triphosphate d'adénosine) par 
l'intermédiaire d'un synthase de triphosphate d'adénosine situé 
dans le bilayer de phospholipide du mitochondrion ou du chloroplaste 
d'une cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra o processo de 
produzir o triphosphate de adenosina (ATP) através de um synthase do 
ATP situado no bilayer do phospholipid do mitochondrion ou do 
chloroplast de uma pilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra il processo di 
produrre il trifosfato di adenosina (trifosfato di adenosina) via uno 
synthase del trifosfato di adenosina situato nel bilayer del 
fosfolipide del mitochondrion o del cloroplasto di una cellula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τη διαδικασία το 
τριφωσφορικό άλας αδενοσίνης (ATP) μέσω ενός synthase 
ATP που βρίσκεται στο φωσφολιπίδιο bilayer του 
mitochondrion ή του χλωροπλάστη ενός κυττάρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra el proceso de 
producir el trifosfato de adenosina (ATP) vía un synthase del ATP 
situado en el bilayer del phospholipid del mitochondrion o del 
cloroplasto de una célula.</string>
          </description>
